entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who did not fasten the cabinet door properly.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a professor and is shaking his head in response to Harry's actions.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as having a similar voice to the girl who rose out of the basin.

entities.name: the girl
entities.description: The girl is described as being scowling and rising out of the stone basin.

relationships.description: Dumbledore reprimands Harry for not fastening the cabinet door properly.
Dumbledore inquires about the hex put on the girl by Harry.
